entry.title: Automatic Subgoal Scheduling for Datalog
entry.summary: In which we investigate dataflow in declarative programs and talk about how to make Datalog safer by statically reordering goals when predicates with dataflow constraints are involved.

entry.title: Cellular Christmas Tree
entry.summary: In which we create a program displaying a Christmas tree from a single dot on an infinite tape using two cellular automata computed with comonads as used in Haskell. You can also call it yet another comonad tutorial if you like.
